text:
Update: It's Oct 20. STILL NO RESOLUTION to a problem I've been contacting MoneyLion about on September 28. I've talked to dozens of people on the phone, filled out two complaint forms that they sent to me on this Trust Pilot review, tried to DM on Twitter, chatted, I even requested to speak to a supervisor over a week ago all to no avail. I am going to try to find a way to close my account indefinitely now. I have reached out to the CEO but Iâ€™m assuming that will result in nothing since this is a terribly ran company. I don't even want to use them anymore at this point. This is ridiculous. 

Iâ€™ve had an issue (stemming from MoneyLionâ€™s system) for almost 3 weeks now. Iâ€™ve spoken to almost 10 people about it. Still nothing. No one can help on Twitter, in the chat or over the phone. Iâ€™ve been given different answers from each customer service agent. For this to be a place where I spend my money, they do not care about my needs or wants. Donâ€™t use this company because if you ever need assistance, youâ€™re out of luck.
title: Issue for 4 WEEKS!
